Message:
The recipient of the letter
smiled at me.

While I understood that
I should feel happy,
my heart remained still.

I bowed, taking my leave
and setting off to
my next destination.

While delivering mail,
I encounter all kinds of emotions.

People overjoyed by
long-awaited messages.
Girls blushing over love notes.
The elderly shedding tears
over letters of farewell.

But through it all,
my face never reacts
to any of those emotions.

I understand the
meanings of these words,
but they stir up
nothing within me.

It all started that fateful day.
Ever since then,
it was as if time
had stood still for me.
